sentences: Younghi Pagh-Paan (born 1945) is a South Korean composer.

In 1974 she received a DAAD scholarship to study in Germany and entered the Freiburg Musikhochschule, where she studied composition with Klaus Huber, analysis with Brian Ferneyhough, music theory with Peter FÃ¶rtig and piano with Edith Picht-Axenfeld.
